prefix: Approach the following question the way someone in high school would.
problem_prompt: Approach the following question the way someone in high school would. What is the remainder when 2007 is divided by 25?
solution: Since 25 divides evenly into 2000 and 2007 is 7 more than 2000, the remainder when 2007 is divided by 25 is $\boxed{7}$.
gpt_response: When you divide 2007 by 25, you get 80 as the quotient with a remainder of 7.
solution_prompt: Yes or no, is the final solution obtained in the following equal to 7?: When you divide 2007 by 25, you get 80 as the quotient with a remainder of 7.
